sentences.chinese: 考慮加入一個後援小組。

sentences.english: All the activities about fans club will be inform here .
sentences.chinese: 後援會獨家活動會在此公佈。

sentences.english: Reach out to your support systems.
Tom: Relax, there's a support team ready to back you up over the radio.
sentences.chinese: 放鬆點，會有一支後援小組通過通訊機給你支援的。

sentences.english: The feisty yet reliable droid served as Rendar's co-pilot and backup.
sentences.chinese: 這個活躍而可靠的機器人是倫德的副駕駛和後援。

sentences.english: And I don't really want to date someone who has a posse .
sentences.chinese: 但我不想和一個有後援團的人約會。

sentences.english: Troops in support were sent to the battle front.
Reserve units of the 359th Brigade stole through the dark mountains.
sentences.chinese: 三五九旅的後援部隊偷越過一片朦朧的山嶺。

sentences.english: Suspects on northbound, 110, heavy gunfire exchanged. We need backup.
sentences.chinese: 嫌犯向北逃逸，110，有火力交鋒，我們請求後援。

sentences.english: Do I have demonstrable backing to support my change?
sentences.chinese: 我是否有明擺的後援團支持我的變革？

sentences.english: Picture is Fanny Wu with her fans group of the hotel after winning the award.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲吳靜怡在獲獎後與酒店後援團的合影。

definition: Kaesong or Gaeseong city in southwest North Korea, close to the border with South Korea and a special economic zone for South Korean companies
to garrison/to stand guard/on garrison duty
the China Seas (the seas of the Western Pacific Ocean, around China: Bohai Sea, Yellow Sea, East China Sea, South China Sea)
Diaoyu Islands, claimed by China but controlled by Japan as the Senkaku Islands, also called the Pinnacle Islands
to fight with all one's might
